This week you will get an introduction to why we visualise data and what makes a good visualisation. There will be a short paper to read to prepare and a seminar. There will be no workshop this week!


### Learning objectives

The successful student will be able to:

-   explain the multiple uses of data visualisations
-   explain the key aspects of an effective visualisation
-   evaluate whether a visualisation is good or bad
